metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9032 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the media-playlists feature inWordPress before 3.9.x before 3.9.3 and 4.x before 4.0.1 allows remoteattackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
